member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerException
member.summary: Base exception class for all NetLedger SDK exceptions.

member.summary: Instantiate a new NetLedger exception.

member.summary: Instantiate a new NetLedger exception with a message.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Instantiate a new NetLedger exception with a message and inner exception.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerConnectionException
member.summary: Exception thrown when the SDK cannot connect to the NetLedger server.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerConnectionException.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate a new connection exception.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerConnectionException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new connection exception with a message.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerConnectionException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Instantiate a new connection exception with a message and inner exception.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException
member.summary: Exception thrown when the NetLedger API returns an error response.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.StatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP status code returned by the server.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.Details
member.summary: Additional details about the error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate a new API exception.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new API exception with a message.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new API exception with status code and message.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new API exception with status code, message, and details.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerApiException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Instantiate a new API exception with message and inner exception.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods
member.summary: Account management operations for the NetLedger API.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.CreateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create a new account.
member.returns: The created account.
member.exception: Thrown when name is null or empty.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.CreateAsync(NetLedger.Sdk.Account,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create a new account with a specific GUID.
member.param: The account to create (GUID will be used if provided).
member.returns: The created account.
member.exception: Thrown when account is null.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.GetAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get an account by its GUID.
member.returns: The account.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.GetByNameAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get an account by its name.
member.returns: The account.
member.exception: Thrown when name is null or empty.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.ExistsAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Check if an account exists.
member.returns: True if the account exists, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.DeleteAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Delete an account.
member.param: The GUID of the account to delete.
member.returns: Task representing the async operation.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IAccountMethods.EnumerateAsync(NetLedger.Sdk.AccountEnumerationQuery,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enumerate accounts with optional filtering and pagination.
member.param: Query parameters for filtering and pagination.
member.returns: Enumeration result containing accounts.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IApiKeyMethods
member.summary: API key management operations for the NetLedger API. Requires admin privileges for most operations.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IApiKeyMethods.CreateAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create a new API key.
member.param: The display name for the API key.
Whether the API key should have admin privileges.
member.returns: The created API key info (includes the API key value).
member.exception: Thrown when name is null or empty.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (401 if not authorized).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IApiKeyMethods.CreateAsync(NetLedger.Sdk.ApiKeyInfo,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Create a new API key.
member.param: The API key info to create.
member.returns: The created API key info (includes the API key value).
member.exception: Thrown when apiKey is null.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (401 if not authorized).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IApiKeyMethods.EnumerateAsync(NetLedger.Sdk.ApiKeyEnumerationQuery,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enumerate API keys with pagination.
member.returns: Enumeration result containing API key info (API key values are not included).
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (401 if not authorized).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IApiKeyMethods.RevokeAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Revoke (delete) an API key.
member.param: The GUID of the API key to revoke.
member.returns: Task representing the async operation.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (401 if not authorized, 404 if not found).

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods
member.summary: Balance operations for the NetLedger API.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.GetAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the current balance for an account.
member.returns: The account balance including pending transactions.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if account not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.GetAsOfAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the historical balance for an account as of a specific date/time.
member.param: The UTC timestamp to get the balance as of.
member.returns: The account balance as of the specified time.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if account not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.GetAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get balances for all accounts.
member.returns: Dictionary mapping account GUIDs to their balances.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.CommitAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Commit all pending entries for an account.
member.returns: The result of the commit operation.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if account not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.CommitAsync(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Commit specific pending entries for an account.
member.param: The GUIDs of the entries to commit.
member.returns: The result of the commit operation.
member.exception: Thrown when entryGuids is null.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if account not found).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IBalanceMethods.VerifyAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Verify the balance chain integrity for an account.
member.returns: True if the balance chain is valid, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if account not found).

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods
member.summary: Entry operations for the NetLedger API.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.AddCreditAsync(System.Guid,System.Decimal,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add a credit entry to an account.
member.param: The credit amount (must be greater than zero).
member.returns: The created credit entry.
member.exception: Thrown when amount is not positive.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.AddCreditsAsync(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.List{NetLedger.Sdk.EntryInput},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add multiple credit entries to an account in a single operation.
member.param: The list of credit entries to add.
member.returns: The list of created credit entries.
member.exception: Thrown when entries is null.
Thrown when any entry has a non-positive amount.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.AddDebitAsync(System.Guid,System.Decimal,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add a debit entry to an account.
member.param: The debit amount (must be greater than zero).
member.returns: The created debit entry.
member.exception: Thrown when amount is not positive.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.AddDebitsAsync(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.List{NetLedger.Sdk.EntryInput},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Add multiple debit entries to an account in a single operation.
member.param: The list of debit entries to add.
member.returns: The list of created debit entries.
member.exception: Thrown when entries is null.
Thrown when any entry has a non-positive amount.
Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.GetAllAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get all entries for an account.
member.returns: List of all entries for the account.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.EnumerateAsync(System.Guid,NetLedger.Sdk.EntryEnumerationQuery,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enumerate entries for an account with filtering and pagination.
member.param: Query parameters for filtering and pagination.
member.returns: Enumeration result containing entries.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.GetPendingAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get all pending (uncommitted) entries for an account.
member.returns: List of pending entries.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.GetPendingCreditsAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get pending credit entries for an account.
member.returns: List of pending credit entries.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.GetPendingDebitsAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get pending debit entries for an account.
member.returns: List of pending debit entries.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IEntryMethods.CancelAsync(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancel (delete) a pending entry.
member.param: The GUID of the entry to cancel.
member.returns: Task representing the async operation.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error (404 if not found, 409 if already committed).

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IServiceMethods
member.summary: Service-level operations for the NetLedger API.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IServiceMethods.HealthCheckAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Check if the NetLedger server is available and responding.
member.returns: True if the server is healthy, false otherwise.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.Interfaces.IServiceMethods.GetInfoAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get information about the NetLedger service.
member.returns: Service information including version and uptime.
member.exception: Thrown when unable to connect to the server.
Thrown when the server returns an error.

member.summary: A credit entry (increases balance).

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryType.Debit
member.summary: A debit entry (decreases balance).

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryType.Balance
member.summary: A balance entry (snapshot of account state at commit time).

member.summary: Represents a ledger entry (credit, debit, or balance snapshot).

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.GUID
member.summary: The unique identifier for the entry.

member.summary: The GUID of the account this entry belongs to.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.Type
member.summary: The type of entry (Credit, Debit, or Balance).

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.Amount
member.summary: The monetary amount of the entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.Description
member.summary: Optional description for the entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.Replaces
member.summary: For balance entries, the GUID of the previous balance entry this replaces.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.Entry.IsCommitted
member.summary: Indicates whether the entry has been committed.

member.summary: The UTC timestamp when the entry was committed.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.EnumerationOrder
member.summary: Specifies the ordering for enumeration results.

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EnumerationOrder.CreatedAscending
member.summary: Order by creation date, ascending (oldest first).

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EnumerationOrder.CreatedDescending
member.summary: Order by creation date, descending (newest first).

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EnumerationOrder.AmountAscending
member.summary: Order by amount, ascending (smallest first).

member.name: F:NetLedger.Sdk.EnumerationOrder.AmountDescending
member.summary: Order by amount, descending (largest first).

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryEnumerationQuery
member.summary: Query parameters for enumerating entries.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryEnumerationQuery.MaxResults
member.summary: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 100. Range: 1-1000.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryEnumerationQuery.Skip
member.summary: Number of results to skip for pagination.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.EntryEnumerationQuery.ContinuationToken
member.summary: Continuation token from a previous query for pagination.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient
member.summary: Client for interacting with the NetLedger Server REST API. Provides access to account, entry, balance, and API key management operations.

remarks.para: This client is thread-safe and can be reused across multiple operations.
The client uses the Bearer token authentication scheme.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.Service
member.summary: Service operations including health checks and service information.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.Account
member.summary: Account management operations including create, read, delete, and enumeration.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.Entry
member.summary: Entry operations including adding credits and debits, enumeration, and cancellation.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.Balance
member.summary: Balance operations including retrieving balances, committing entries, and verification.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.ApiKey
member.summary: API key management operations including create, enumerate, and revoke.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base URL of the NetLedger server.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Request timeout in milliseconds. Default is 30000 (30 seconds). Minimum is 1000 (1 second). Maximum is 300000 (5 minutes).

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a new NetLedger client.
member.param: The base URL of the NetLedger server (e.g., "http://localhost:8080").
member.exception: Thrown when baseUrl or apiKey is null or empty.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the NetLedgerClient.

member.summary: Get the JSON deserializer options.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Sdk.NetLedgerClient.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources.
